input.sentences: the visuals were very striking in black and white .
this in particular looked very cool .
it was a really interesting day !
afterwards we went for drinks and had a lot of fun .
quite a few memories were made today !
output.sentences: Tonight we went to an art opening that focused on white negative space juxtaposed with striking visuals.
While the art theory stuff was actually way over my head, it definitely looked cool.
I caught up with my friend David, who had work exhibited at the opening and talked to him about his day.
Afterward, we all went for drinks which turned out to be a lot of fun.
I love making memories with my very talented friends, even if I don't fully understand what their art means.
